Package stats

Class StatsOnSize

java.lang.Object
stats.StatsOnSize
public class StatsOnSize extends Object
This class calculates the statistic based on the size of the files
Author:
Porfiri Pierandrea, Staffolani Federico

  • Method Details

    • biggestfileforExt

      public String biggestfileforExt() throws EmptyListExc
      This method makes the computation of the statistic
      Returns:
      a string containing the name and the size of the biggest file among the ones with the given extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • smallerfileforExt

      public String smallerfileforExt() throws EmptyListExc
      This method makes the computation of the statistic
      Returns:
      a string containing the name and the size of the smallest file among the ones with the given extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • higherDim

      public String higherDim() throws EmptyListExc
      This method makes the computation of the statistic
      Returns:
      a string containing the number of all the files bigger than the given size, divided for extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

    • lowerDim

      public String lowerDim() throws EmptyListExc
      This method makes the computation of the statistic
      Returns:
      a string containing the number of all the files smaller than the given size, divided for extension
      Throws:
      EmptyListExc - the list is empty

      Gets the extension.
